{{also|zurück-}} ==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|zu|Rücken}}; the former was {{m|gmh|zuo}}, {{m|gmh|zū}}, {{m|gmh|ze}} and the latter was {{m|gmh|rücke}}, {{m|gmh|rucke}}, {{m|gmh|rück}}, {{m|gmh|ruck}}, {{m|gmh|rügge}}, {{m|gmh|rugge}} in Middle High German. Cognate with {{cog|hrx|zurick}} and {{cog|nl|terug}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/t͡suˈʁʏk/}} * {{hyph|de|zu|rück}} * {{audio|de|DE-zurück.ogg|audio}} * {{audio|de|BY-zurück.ogg|Audio (Bavarian)}} ===Adverb=== {{de-adv}} # [[back]], [[backwards]], to the rear. ===Interjection=== {{head|de|interjection|head=zurück!}} # [[stand back]]! ===Related terms=== * {{l|de|zurücke}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
